  • Method Details

    • drawIslands

      public static List<javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane> drawIslands(GameState gameState, double pageWidth, double pageHeight, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Draws the islands accordingly to the given GameState
      Parameters:
      gameState - the GameState to fetch the information about the islands from
      pageWidth - the width of the screen
      pageHeight - the height of the screen
      root - the AnchorPane to attach the islands to

    • getElementsOnIsland

      private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox getElementsOnIsland(IslandState island, int islandIndex, double initialX, double initialY, double islandWidth)
      Returns a VBox containing all the elements on the input island - towers, students and noEntry pawns
      Parameters:
      island - the IslandState to draw all the elements of
      islandIndex - the index of the input IslandState inside the array of islands
      initialX - the x position of the upper-left angle of VBox containing the elements
      initialY - the y position of the upper-left angle of VBox containing the elements
      islandWidth - the width of the drawn island
      Returns:
      a VBox containing all the elements on the input island

    • getMotherNatureImage

      private static javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane getMotherNatureImage(double mnWidth, double mnY)
      Returns an ImageView representing mother nature
      Parameters:
      mnWidth - the fixed width of mother nature image
      mnY - the y position of the upper-left angle of mother nature image
      Returns:
      an ImageView representing mother nature
